description.translate: Your form becomes your strength, because it is the only thing that really matters.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Nu gal menä\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Votre forme devient votre force, car c'est la\"}","{\"text\":\"§7seule chose qui importe vraiment.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Your form becomes your strength, because it is\"}","{\"text\":\"§7the only thing that really matters.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HER§a2 §7DAR§a2 §7HUN§c-2\"}"]}}
